securityHabits.name: Password Manager
securityHabits.description: Use a password manager to generate and store unique passwords
tips: Choose a reputable password manager like Bitwarden, 1Password, or LastPass
Generate unique passwords for each account
Use the browser extension for easy access
Enable two-factor authentication on your password manager

securityHabits.name: Email Vigilance
securityHabits.description: Review emails for phishing attempts and suspicious links
tips: Don't click suspicious links or attachments
Verify urgent requests through another channel
Report phishing emails to your email provider

securityHabits.name: Lock Your Devices
securityHabits.description: Always lock your computer and phone when stepping away
tips: Use Windows Key + L on Windows or Control + Command + Q on Mac
Set auto-lock after 5 minutes of inactivity
Use strong PIN or biometric authentication
Never leave devices unattended in public

securityHabits.name: App Permissions Check
securityHabits.description: Review and limit app permissions on your devices
tips: Check which apps have location access
Uninstall apps you no longer use

securityHabits.name: Secure Wi-Fi Usage
securityHabits.description: Use secure networks and avoid public Wi-Fi for sensitive activities
tips: Use WPA3 encryption on home networks
Avoid public Wi-Fi for banking or shopping
Use a VPN when on public networks
Forget public Wi-Fi networks after use

securityHabits.name: Verify HTTPS
securityHabits.description: Always check for HTTPS before entering sensitive information
tips: Look for the padlock icon in the address bar
Never enter passwords on HTTP sites
Use browser extensions that enforce HTTPS

securityHabits.name: Social Media Privacy
securityHabits.description: Review and adjust social media privacy settings
tips: Limit who can see your posts

securityHabits.name: Clear Browser Data
securityHabits.description: Clear cookies and cache to protect privacy
tips: Use private browsing for sensitive searches

securityHabits.name: Two-Factor Authentication
securityHabits.description: Enable 2FA on all important accounts
tips: Use authenticator apps instead of SMS when possible
Enable 2FA on email, banking, and social media accounts
Keep backup codes in a safe place
Consider hardware security keys for maximum protection

securityHabits.name: Data Breach Monitoring
securityHabits.description: Check for data breaches involving your email
tips: Check for breaches at least monthly
Use services like Have I Been Pwned
Monitor your accounts for suspicious activity

securityHabits.name: Software Updates
securityHabits.description: Keep all devices and software up to date
tips: Enable automatic updates for your operating system

securityHabits.name: Account Activity Review
securityHabits.description: Review login activity on important accounts

securityHabits.name: Password Audit
securityHabits.description: Review and update weak or reused passwords
tips: Use password manager's security audit feature

securityHabits.name: Privacy Settings Audit
securityHabits.description: Review privacy settings across all platforms
tips: Review app permissions on phone and computer

securityHabits.name: Antivirus Scan
securityHabits.description: Run a full system antivirus scan

securityHabits.name: Email Filter Management
securityHabits.description: Update spam filters and email rules
tips: Mark spam emails to improve filtering
Create rules to organize important emails

securityHabits.name: Data Backup
securityHabits.description: Backup important data to multiple locations
tips: Follow the 3-2-1 rule: 3 copies, 2 different media, 1 offsite

securityHabits.name: Device Security Audit
securityHabits.description: Review all connected devices and their security
tips: List all devices accessing your accounts
Check for firmware updates on IoT devices
Ensure all devices have security software

securityHabits.name: Security Training
securityHabits.description: Complete annual cybersecurity awareness training
tips: Stay updated on latest security threats
Share knowledge with family and friends

securityHabits.name: Cyber Insurance Review
securityHabits.description: Review cyber insurance and identity theft protection

securityHabits.name: Full Security Audit
securityHabits.description: Conduct a comprehensive security review of all accounts and devices

securityHabits.name: Emergency Response Plan
securityHabits.description: Update your cybersecurity incident response plan
tips: Know who to contact if compromised

securityHabits.name: Secure Important Documents
securityHabits.description: Review and secure storage of critical documents
tips: Keep physical copies in safe location

securityHabits.name: Digital Legacy Planning
securityHabits.description: Update digital asset access for trusted contacts
tips: Designate trusted person for account access
